name: Total Assimilation
description:
Total Assimilation
Consume everything!

Start off as a small slime cell and grow yourself by absorbing everything else in sight. Face off against viruses, scientists in hazmat suits, and tanks. Eat different things to boost your stats. The world is your oyster - and you've been craving seafood lately.

Controls: WADS to move. That's it. You can run into things to consume them or attack them until you consume them.

Made by Noah Kuhn and Alex Hanlin (@Gluethulhu) for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.
Noah Kuhn: Programming, Design, Audio
Alex Hanlin: Art, UI
